concept.title: Katalon Recorder vs Alternatives

conbody.p: This comparison features Katalon Recorder, Selenium IDE, iMacros.

li.p: KR: users are able to start recording tests in less than 10 seconds
S.IDE: users are able to start recording tests in less then 30 seconds
iMacros: users are able to start recording tests in less than 10 seconds

row.entry: Record manual activities on a web app

li.p: KR and S.IDE: Edit in UI mode
KR, S.IDE: Edit in UI mode

row.entry: Play back, Pause, and Resume tests

li.p: KR, S.IDE support run test suites and all tests
iMacros does not support run test suites
KR and S.IDE support exporting test projects to multiple scripting languages
iMacros (free version) does not support exporting test projects.

row.entry: Drag and drop tests and test suites

li.p: S.IDE only supports dnd tests in test suite view mode
KR allows viewing reports and dashboard viaTestOps
